description.en-us: Chopcycles was a short-lived series of 1:32 scale motorized motorbikes produced during the Redline era from 1972 to 1973 . The selling point of the motorbikes was their use of Sizzlers technology and used a snap-on implement known as a Bumper Claw to allow them to race on Hot Wheels Fat Track. While this series used Hot Wheels technology and design these were not officially branded as Hot Wheels products.
